meanings.definition: To express in terms of parameters.
meanings.sent1: She was parameterizing the equation to make it easier to solve.
meanings.sent2: The scientist was parameterizing the data to analyze it effectively.
meanings.sent3: The teacher parameterizing the lesson plan made it more organized.
meanings.sent4: By parameterizing the problem, he was able to break it down into simpler steps.
meanings.sent5: Parameterizing the instructions helped clarify the process for everyone.

meanings.definition: To determine or fix the parameters of.
meanings.sent1: The engineer was parameterizing the specifications for the project.
meanings.sent2: They were parameterizing the variables to ensure accurate results.
meanings.sent3: Parameterizing the rules of the game added an interesting twist.
meanings.sent4: She was parameterizing the boundaries, creating a clear outline.
meanings.sent5: By parameterizing the settings, he customized the experience for each user.
